trans-unit.source: Represents a trigger that applies property values or performs actions when the bound data meets a specified condition.
trans-unit.target: 表示觸發程序 (Trigger)，這個觸發程序會在繫結資料符合特定條件時套用屬性值或執行動作。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Style>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, and <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> all have a triggers collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Style><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，和<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>所有有觸發程序集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> allows you to set property values when the property value of the data object matches a specified <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>可讓您設定的屬性值時資料物件的屬性值符合指定<xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are displaying a list of `Employee` objects, you may want the foreground color to be different based on each `Employee's` current attendance.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您要顯示一份`Employee`物件，您可能會想要不同的前景色彩根據每個`Employee's`目前參加。

trans-unit.source: (For example, `Employees` who are currently on vacation are displayed with a purple foreground.) In some scenarios it may be more suitable to create a converter or to use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>.
trans-unit.target: (例如，`Employees`誰正在度假會顯示與紫色前景。)在某些情況下可能會建立轉換子，或使用適合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Note that you must specify both the <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger.Binding%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger.Value%2A> properties on a <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> for the data trigger to be meaningful.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您必須同時指定<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger.Binding%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger.Value%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>為有意義資料觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: If one or both of the properties are not specified, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定一或兩個屬性，則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger.Setters%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> object can only consist of <xref:System.Windows.Setter> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger.Setters%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>物件只可包含數<xref:System.Windows.Setter>物件。

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.Setter> child to a <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> object implicitly adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.SetterBaseCollection> for the <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> object.
trans-unit.target: 加入<xref:System.Windows.Setter>子系<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>物件隱含地將它加入至<xref:System.Windows.SetterBaseCollection>如<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> objects are not supported; only <xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> supports <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> 不支援物件。只有<xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>支援<xref:System.Windows.EventSetter>物件。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> is bound to *Places*, an <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> of *Place* objects.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>繫結至*數位*、<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>的*位置*物件。

trans-unit.source: *Place* objects have properties *Name* and *State*.
trans-unit.target: *位置*物件具有屬性*名稱*和*狀態*。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> displays a *Place* object.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>顯示*位置*物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Style> in the example is applied to each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Style>在此範例會套用到每個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> is specified such that if the *State* of the *Place* data item is "WA" then the foreground of the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> is set to Red.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>指定，如果*狀態*的*位置*資料項目是"WA"的對應前景<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>設定為紅色。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action, and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to animate a property when bound data meets a specified condition.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>動作，以及<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>來繫結的資料符合指定的條件時，建立屬性的動畫。

trans-unit.source: The example displays inventory information in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會顯示中的清查資訊<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: It uses a <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> to animate the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Opacity%2A> of every <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> that contains an out-of-stock book.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>以動畫方式顯示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Opacity%2A>的每個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>包含存貨出活頁簿。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTrigger" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTrigger" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the binding that produces the property value of the data object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定產生資料物件屬性值的繫結。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The property value produced by this binding is compared with the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個繫結所產生的屬性值會與所指定的值相比<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger.Value%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: That value is first converted to the type of the value of the binding (if possible), and then the two values are compared using the `Object.Equals` method.
trans-unit.target: 值是第一個轉換成繫結 （如果可能的話） 的值的類型，然後使用比較的兩個值`Object.Equals`方法。

trans-unit.source: If the two values are equal, then the associated actions or setters are applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個值相等，則相關聯的動作或 setter 會套用。

trans-unit.source: You create a binding and use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A> property to bind to a property of a certain object (the binding source object).
trans-unit.target: 建立繫結，並使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A>屬性要繫結至某一特定物件 （繫結來源物件） 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you may bind to the *Priority* property of a *Task*.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可能會繫結*優先順序*屬性*工作*。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Note that you must specify both the <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger.Binding%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger.Value%2A> properties on a <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> for the data trigger to be meaningful.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您必須同時指定<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger.Binding%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger.Value%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>為有意義資料觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: If one or both of the properties are not set, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定一或兩個屬性，則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 屬性項目用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *declaration*
trans-unit.target: *declaration*

trans-unit.source: Zero or more attribute-assignment clauses separated by commas (,).
trans-unit.target: 以逗號 （，） 分隔的零或多個屬性指派子句。

trans-unit.source: See [Binding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/binding-markup-extension.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[繫結標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/binding-markup-extension.md)如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderBrush%2A> of the element named `border` to `Yellow` if the `TaskType` property is `TaskType.Home`.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderBrush%2A>名為的項目`border`至`Yellow`如果`TaskType`屬性是`TaskType.Home`。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed discussion of this example, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 此範例的詳細討論，請參閱[資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The object where the markup extension sets the value.
trans-unit.target: 標記延伸會在此設定值的物件。

trans-unit.source: Data that is relevant for markup extension processing.
trans-unit.target: 與標記延伸處理相關的資料。

trans-unit.source: Handles cases where a markup extension provides a value for a property of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTrigger" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 處理標記延伸對 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTrigger" /> 物件的屬性提供值的情況。

trans-unit.source: This is the method referenced by an applied <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionAttribute> attribute at the class level, which means that this method processes all attempts to set values of <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> with a markup extension.
trans-unit.target: 這是套用所參考方法<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionAttribute>類別層級，這表示這個方法會處理所有嘗試都將值設定屬性<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>搭配標記延伸。

trans-unit.source: You do not typically call this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 您沒有不通常直接呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Setter" /> objects, which describe the property values to apply when the data item meets the specified condition.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Setter" /> 物件的集合，這些物件描述當資料項目符合指定的條件時要套用的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 屬性項目用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *ZeroOrMoreSetters*
trans-unit.target: *ZeroOrMoreSetters*

trans-unit.source: Zero or more <xref:System.Windows.Setter> objects.
trans-unit.target: 零或多個<xref:System.Windows.Setter>物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> allows you to start actions or to use <xref:System.Windows.Setter>s to apply property values when the data item meets a specified condition.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>可讓您啟動動作，或是使用<xref:System.Windows.Setter>s 套用屬性值時資料的項目符合指定的條件。

trans-unit.source: If there is more than one setter setting the same property in the same setter collection, the setter that is declared last is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多個相同的 setter 集合中設定相同屬性的 setter，宣告 setter 最後會使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger.Setters%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> object can only consist of <xref:System.Windows.Setter> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger.Setters%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>物件只可包含數<xref:System.Windows.Setter>物件。

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.Setter> child to a <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> object implicitly adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.SetterBaseCollection> for the <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> object.
trans-unit.target: 加入<xref:System.Windows.Setter>子系<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>物件隱含地將它加入至<xref:System.Windows.SetterBaseCollection>如<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> objects are not supported; only <xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> supports <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> 不支援物件。只有<xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>支援<xref:System.Windows.EventSetter>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows two <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> objects that are defined in a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範兩個<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>中所定義的物件<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> is applied to *AuctionItem* data objects (not shown in this example), which have the property *SpecialFeatures*.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>套用至*AuctionItem*資料物件 （在此範例中未顯示），將屬性*SpecialFeatures*。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> is specified such that if the data object has a *SpecialFeatures* value of *Color*, then the item is displayed with a `DodgerBlue` background with Navy titles.
trans-unit.target: 第一個<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>指定的資料物件必須有*SpecialFeatures*值*色彩*，則項目會顯示與`DodgerBlue`背景以海軍藍的標題。

trans-unit.source: If the data object has a *SpecialFeatures* value of *Highlight*, then the second <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> will be active, causing the item to be displayed with an Orange border with a star.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料物件都有*SpecialFeatures*值*反白顯示*，然後第二個<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>會啟用，讓一個橘色框線與星狀顯示的項目。

trans-unit.source: For the complete sample, see [Data Binding Demo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).
trans-unit.target: 如需完整範例，請參閱[資料繫結示範](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的子物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: 加入子物件。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要加入物件中的文字。

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: 將節點的文字內容加入物件中。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value to be compared with the property value of the data object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要與資料物件之屬性值比較的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: See also the Exceptions section.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱「例外狀況」一節。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 屬性項目用法

trans-unit.source: This value is compared with the property value produced by the <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger.Binding%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會與所產生的屬性值相比<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger.Binding%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>。

trans-unit.source: The comparison is a reference equality check.
trans-unit.target: 這個比較是參考相等檢查。

trans-unit.source: If the two values are equal, then the associated actions or setters are applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個值相等，則相關聯的動作或 setter 會套用。

trans-unit.source: Note that you must specify both the <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger.Binding%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger.Value%2A> properties on a <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> for the data trigger to be meaningful.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您必須同時指定<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger.Binding%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger.Value%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>為有意義資料觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: If one or both properties are not set, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定一或兩個屬性，將會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> is bound to *Places*, an <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> of *Place* objects.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>繫結至*數位*、<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>的*位置*物件。

trans-unit.source: *Place* objects have properties *Name* and *State*.
trans-unit.target: *位置*物件具有屬性*名稱*和*狀態*。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> displays a *Place* object.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>顯示*位置*物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Style> in the example is applied to each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Style>在此範例會套用到每個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> is specified such that if the *State* of the *Place* data item is "WA" then the foreground of the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> is set to Red.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>指定，如果*狀態*的*位置*資料項目是"WA"的對應前景<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>設定為紅色。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows two <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>s that are defined in a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範兩個<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>中所定義的 s <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> is applied to *AuctionItem* data objects (not shown in this example), which have the property *SpecialFeatures*.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>套用至*AuctionItem*資料物件 （在此範例中未顯示），將屬性*SpecialFeatures*。

trans-unit.source: See [Data Binding Demo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703) for the complete example.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[資料繫結示範](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)如完整的範例。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> is specified such that if the data object has a *SpecialFeatures* value of *Color*, then the item is displayed with a DodgerBlue background with Navy titles.
trans-unit.target: 第一個<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>指定的資料物件必須有*SpecialFeatures*值*色彩*，則具有 DodgerBlue 背景與海軍藍的標題顯示的項目。

trans-unit.source: If the data object has a *SpecialFeatures* value of *Highlight*, then the second <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> will be active, causing the item to be displayed with an Orange border with a star.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料物件都有*SpecialFeatures*值*反白顯示*，然後第二個<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>會啟用，讓一個橘色框線與星狀顯示的項目。

trans-unit.source: Expressions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援運算式。

trans-unit.source: Bindings are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援繫結。
